thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Martin - Dubai

author: Martin - Dubai
title: Martin - Dubai
text:
The process was as easy as it could be both online and via the app which I downloaded. Got a good price from Rentalcars/ Europcar, a good vehicle (Pajero 7-seat SUV) in very good condition, and because of my location I was able to have the car dropped off to me and collected from me. I admit this is unusual, but it was very enjoyable. A good experience all round.
I have already booked again for this coming weekend, so I must have liked it! I hope they can keep up the standard.
